alert.note: Alert for Greene; Hale; Pickens; Tuscaloosa (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 4:44PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Tuscaloosa, southeastern Pickens, northern Greene and northwestern Hale Counties through 530 PM CDT... At 444 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near West Greene to near Eutaw. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Eutaw, Moundville, Akron, Union, New West Greene, Mantua, Allison, Jena, West Greene, Knoxville, Benevola, Snoddy, Ralph, Moundville Airport, Eutaw Municipal Airport, Clinton, Mound State Park, Fosters, Pleasant Ridge and Pioneer. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
